thread.title: IBM Reports Another Quarter of Declining Revenue
thread.title_full: IBM Reports Another Quarter of Declining Revenue - WSJ

author: Tess Stynes
title: IBM Reports Another Quarter of Declining Revenue
text:
International Business Machines Corp. said its third-quarter revenue fell 14%, hurt by declines in hardware sales and the stronger dollar, as the technology giant posted its 14th straight quarter of year-to-year revenue declines.
Shares fell 3.2% to $144.40 in recent after-hours trading as revenue missed expectations and the company cut its 2015 guidance.
The Armonk, N.Y., company said revenue declined to $19.28 billion in... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
